title: Can't leave a comment on someones thread?
body: For some reason I can't leave a comment on anybody's thread. I can type it but when i click post it doesn't post itself, doesn't matter how many times I click it, it doesn't work. I have commented a bunch of times before but it recently stopped letting me do it.

replies.body:
I recommend [clearing your browser's cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or trying another browser entirely (with no extensions/addons) to ensure this isn't caused by a specific extension on your current browser.

Let me know if this helped!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AaE3x1Kh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-05T04:06:08.671+0000)
>
> I recommend [clearing your browser's cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or trying another browser entirely (with no extensions/addons) to ensure this isn't caused by a specific extension on your current browser.
> 
> Let me know if this helped!

Clearing the cache sadly didn't work, but switching to Firefox did the trick. Guess I will have to say bye to Chrome, at least when browsing the boards.
Edit: never mind, it actually works on chrome now! Thanks for your help.
